help-file.title: "GATE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependant upon level of caster Type of spell: Teleportation
"Gate" is a rather powerful spell which creates a multidirectional portal to another plane of existence. The destination of the gate is totally random and cannot be directed.
The planes that may be directly gated are:
-The Elemental Plane Of Earth -The Elemental Plane Of Water -The Elemental Plane Of Air -The Elemental Plane Of Fire -The Plane Of Avernus On The Nine Hells -
The Negative Material Plane -
The Ethereal Plane -The Astral Plane
